title: Manufacture metal punches
content:
Hello everybody, i am looking to manufacture metal punches of my initial with an exactly size. Where can I ask that please ?  
Help me please i need it for my work.  
Best regards  
Roger

 [‹ Matching font for DIN](http://web.archive.org/web/20071202041118/http:/typophile.com/node/39260 "Go to previous forum topic") [Red asterisks and underlines ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071202041118/http:/typophile.com/node/39636 "Go to next forum topic")
author: lascar

comments.content: Wht are you going to be punching?
Maybe [M&H Type](http://web.archive.org/web/20071202041118/http:/www.arionpress.com/mandh/) in San Francisco can help.
